- - - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Edel, Sounds good. Thanks for the information. Take care,Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: From: <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com">sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. <span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma","sans-serif";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman"> Dalis Mama [mailto:mm_dls@yahoo.com] Sent: Tuesday, February 21, 2012 8:13 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: RE: MBO Partners Thank you Sara. I have enlisted with Asian Development Bank as an indepedent consultant. We have the ABD regional office here in Manila, Philippines. If you put up even a correspondence office or desk here in Manila, I can manage it as your Philippine partner. Thanks. Edel G Morales
--- On Wed, 2/22/12, Sara Conde < <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com">sconde@mbopartners.com<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailOriginal>> wrote: From: Sara Conde < <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com">sconde@mbopartners.com<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailOriginal>> Subject: RE: MBO Partners To: "Dalis Mama" < <mailto:mm_dls@yahoo.com">mm_dls@yahoo.com<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailOriginal>> Date: Wednesday, February 22, 2012, 2:05 AMHi Edel, I will certainly keep that in mind if we ever do international work. Take care!Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlxmsUtly%2BWYKqbi0TbPd%2FLC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D" target="_blank">sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. From: Dalis Mama [mailto:mm_dls@yahoo.com]<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailOriginal> Sent: Tuesday, February 21, 2012 2:29 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Partners Thank you Sara. Thanks Edel G Morales
--- On Thu, 2/16/12, Sara Conde < <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlxmsUtly%2BWYKqbi0TbPd%2FLC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D" target="_blank">sconde@mbopartners.com<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailOriginal>> wrote: From: Sara Conde < <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlxmsUtly%2BWYKqbi0TbPd%2FLC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D" target="_blank">sconde@mbopartners.com<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailOriginal>> Subject: MBO Partners To: " <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:mm_dls@yahoo.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlxmsUtly%2BWYKqbi0TbPd%2FLC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D" target="_blank">mm_dls@yahoo.com" <mm_dls@yahoo.com<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailOriginal>> Date: Thursday, February 16, 2012, 11:20 PMHi Edel, Thank so much for reaching out to MBO. Unfortunately we are only structured to work in the United States. Additionally, we do not do any type of job placement but rather handle the back office administration for consultants once they have a project.
